Hey Eric:

hcc is all we have at the moment.

Its used at the core of our archiveit.org service coordinating a cluster 
of heterogeneous heritrix clusters.  It hasn't been getting updates of 
late because for archiveits' purposes, as is, its sufficent (Launching 
and stopping of jobs, basic monitoring).  Also, the fella who was 
working on it, Danny, is gone (is going) on sabbatical.

hcc will likely get a dusting-off one of these days.  Any controller 
application for an Heritrix cluster will likely start with this code base.

I do not see any issues with using it to launch multiple Heritrix 
instances per JVM.  As far as hcc is concerned, its all the same if its 
a Heritrix per JVM or multiple Heritrice per JVM.

St.Ack
